name: tamato-berry
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases happiness by 10/5/2.  Lowers Speed effort by 10.
short_effect: Drops Speed Effort Values by 10 and raises happiness.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
POKéBLOCK ingredient.
Plant in loamy soil
to grow TAMATO.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Makes a POKéMON
friendly but lowers
base SPEED.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Can be ground up into a powder as
an ingredient for medicine.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A Poffin ingredient. Using it on a
Pokémon makes it more friendly, but
it also lowers its base Speed stat.

it also lowers its base Speed stat.
